title: Bandwidth: GeForce Now brings Star Wars on deck, PlayStation Now expands its library
content:
In case you missed it, this week was May the 4th – a great excuse for every company to do something Star Wars-related. NVIDIA’s GeForce Now took that opportunity to bring three new Star Wars games to the table, including Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. To add, PlayStation Plus is starting to pad out its subscription service for existing and new gamers.

more…

The post Bandwidth: GeForce Now brings Star Wars on deck, PlayStation Now expands its library appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: GeForce Now took advantage of May 4 and added three new Star Wars games. To add, PlayStation Now adds a couple of titles as well.
